tool_description: This API list the materials needed in a DIY and gives the estimated cost per material and the estimated cost of the project.
name: DYI Materials Costing
title: DYI Materials Costing

api_list.name: Test API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dyi-materials-costing.p.rapidapi.com/testAPI"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dyi-materials-costing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dyi-materials-costing.p.rapidapi.com/testAPI"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dyi-materials-costing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: DIY Materials Costing
api_list.description:
Parameter:  Kite

[Example Result]
Materials Needed:
-Kite frame (wooden or plastic dowel rods) - $3-5
-Kite string - $3-5
-Kite fabric (ripstop nylon, polyester, or silk) - $10-20
-Kite tail (ribbon, plastic strips, or fabric) - $1-5
-Kite bridle (string or cord) - $3-5
-Kite handles (plastic, wood, or foam) - $3-5
-kite line (cotton, polyester, or kevlar) - $5-15

Total estimated cost: $30-65
